cards.name: Chishiro, the Shattered Blade
cards.text:
Whenever an Aura or Equipment enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/2 red Spirit creature token with menace.
At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on each modified creature you control. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

cards.name: Kotori, Pilot Prodigy
cards.text:
Vehicles you control have crew 2.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, target artifact creature you control gains lifelink and vigilance until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Some people test limits. I prefer to demolish them."

cards.name: Kaima, the Fractured Calm
cards.text: At the beginning of your end step, goad each creature your opponents control that's enchanted by an Aura you control. Put a +1/+1 counter on Kaima, the Fractured Calm for each creature goaded this way. (Until your next turn, the goaded creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)

cards.name: Shorikai, Genesis Engine
cards.text:
{1}, {T}: Draw two cards, then discard a card. Create a 1/1 colorless Pilot creature token with "This creature crews Vehicles as though its power were 2 greater."
Crew 8 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 8 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
Shorikai, Genesis Engine can be your commander.

cards.name: Aerial Surveyor
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Aerial Surveyor attacks, if defending player controls more lands than you, search your library for a basic Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Crew 2

cards.name: Drumbellower
cards.text:
Flying
Untap all creatures you control during each other player's untap step.
cards.flavor: By the second night after the kami had drifted into town, the local general store was completely sold out of earplugs.

cards.name: Ironsoul Enforcer
cards.text: Whenever Ironsoul Enforcer or a commander you control attacks alone, return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
cards.flavor: "You break it, you buy it. You steal it, I find it."

cards.name: Organic Extinction
cards.text:
Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
Destroy all nonartifact creatures.
cards.flavor:
"Technology evolves faster than a blade can swing."
-Arima, lead inventor of the Futurists

cards.name: Release to Memory
cards.text: Exile target opponent's graveyard. For each creature card exiled this way, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token.
cards.flavor:
"Those who have passed are beyond war, beyond suffering. Mourn them, envy them, but about all, remember them."
-Light-Paws, Imperial advisor

cards.name: Swift Reconfiguration
cards.text:
Flash
Enchant creature or Vehicle
Enchanted permanent is a Vehicle artifact with crew 5 and it loses all other card types. (It's not a creature unless its crewed.)
cards.flavor: On the bright side, the bear now had cupholders.

cards.name: Access Denied
cards.text: Counter target spell. Create X 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying, where X is that spell's mana value.
cards.flavor: The Saiba Futurists guard their secret experiments with ever-evolving networks of cutting-edge defensive technology.

cards.name: Cyberdrive Awakener
cards.text:
Flying
Other artifact creatures you control have flying.
When Cyberdrive Awakener enters the battlefield, until end of turn, each noncreature artifact you control becomes an artifact creature with base power and toughness 4/4.

cards.name: Imposter Mech
cards.text:
You may have Imposter Mech enter the battlefield as a copy of a creature an opponent controls, except its a Vehicle artifact with crew 3 and it loses all other card types.
Crew 3
cards.flavor: The best way to fight evil is with its own weapons.

cards.name: Kappa Cannoneer
cards.text:
Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
Ward {4}
Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Kappa Cannoneer and it can't be blocked this turn.

cards.name: Katsumasa, the Animator
cards.text:
Flying
{2}{U}: Until end of turn, target noncreature artifact you control becomes an artifact creature and gains flying. If it's not a Vehicle, it has base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn.
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to three target noncreature artifacts.

cards.name: Research Thief
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
Whenever an artifact creature you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
cards.flavor: The Futurists eagerly supplement their research with their rivals' closely guarded secrets.

cards.name: Universal Surveillance
cards.text:
Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
Draw X cards.
cards.flavor: Few outside the Saiba Futurists know the true extent of their data-extraction network.

cards.name: Akki Battle Squad
cards.text: Whenever one or more modified creatures you control attack, untap all modified creatures you control. After this combat phase, there is an additional combat phase. This ability triggers only once each turn. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

cards.name: Collision of Realms
cards.text: Each player shuffles all creatures they own into their library. Each player who shuffled a nontoken creature into their library this way reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a creature card, then puts that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of their library in a random order.

cards.name: Kami of Celebration
cards.text:
Whenever a modified creature you control attacks, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)
Whenever you cast a spell from exile, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

cards.name: Komainu Battle Armor
cards.text:
Menace
Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has menace.
Whenever Komainu Battle Armor or equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, goad each creature that player controls.
Reconfigure {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)

cards.name: Smoke Spirits' Aid
cards.text: For each of up to X target creatures, create a red Aura enchantment token named Smoke Blessing attached to that creature. Those tokens have enchant creature and "When enchanted creature dies, it deals 1 damage to its controller and you create a Treasure token."

cards.name: Unquenchable Fury
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "Whenever this creature attacks, it deals X damage to defending player, where X is the number of cards in their hand."
When Unquenchable Fury is put into your graveyard from the battlfield, return it to your hand.

cards.name: Ascendant Acolyte
cards.text:
Ascendant Acolyte enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each +1/+1 counter among other creatures you control.
At the beginning of your upkeep, double the number of +1/+1 counters on Ascendant Acolyte.
cards.flavor: "Limits exist solely to test the will."

cards.name: Concord with the Kami
cards.text:
At the beginning of your end step, choose one or more -
• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature with a counter on it.
• Draw a card if you control an enchanted creature.
• Create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token if you control an equipped creature.

cards.name: Kosei, Penitent Warlord
cards.text: As long as Kosei, Penitent Warlord is enchanted, equipped, and has a counter on it, Kosei has "Whenever Kosei, Penitent Warlord deals combat damage to an opponent, you draw that many cards and Kosei deals that much damage to each other opponent."

cards.name: One with the Kami
cards.text:
Flash
Enchant creature you control
Whenever enchanted creature or another modified creature you control dies, create X 1/1 colorless Spirit creature tokens, where X is that creature's power. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

cards.name: Rampant Rejuvenator
cards.text:
Rampant Rejuvenator enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
When Rampant Rejuvenator dies, search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is Rampant Rejuvenator's power, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

cards.name: Silkguard
cards.text:
Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to X target creatures you control.
Auras, Equipment, and modified creatures you control gain hexproof until end of turn. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

cards.name: Tanuki Transplanter
cards.text:
Whenever Tanuki Transplanter or equipped creature attacks, add an amount of {G} equal to its power. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.
Reconfigure {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)

cards.name: Myojin of Blooming Dawn
cards.text:
Myojin of Blooming Dawn enters the battlefield with an indestructible counter on it if you cast it from your hand.
Remove an indestructible counter from Myojin of Blooming Dawn: Create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token for each permanent you control.

cards.name: Yoshimaru, Ever Faithful
cards.text:
Whenever another legendary permanent enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Yoshimaru, Ever Faithful.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
cards.flavor: Day after day he sat there, knowing that the Wanderer would soon be back for him.

cards.name: Myojin of Cryptic Dreams
cards.text:
Myojin of Cryptic Dreams enters the battlefield with an indestructible counter on it if you cast it from your hand.
Remove an indestructible counter from Myojin of Cryptic Dreams: Copy target permanent spell you control three times. (The copies become tokens.)

cards.name: Myojin of Grim Betrayal
cards.text:
Myojin of Grim Betrayal enters the battlefield with an indestructible counter on it if you cast it from your hand.
Remove an indestructible counter from Myojin of Grim Betrayal: Put onto the battlefield under your control all creature cards in all graveyards that were put there from anywhere this turn.

cards.name: Ruthless Technomancer
cards.text:
When Ruthless Technomancer enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another creature you control. If you do, create a number of Treasure tokens equal to that creature's power.
{2}{B}, Sacrifice X artifacts: Return target creature card with power X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. X can't be 0.

cards.name: Myojin of Roaring Blades
cards.text:
Myojin of Roaring Blades enters the battlefield with an indestructible counter on it if you cast it from your hand.
Remove an indestructible counter from Myojin of Roaring Blades: It deals 7 damage to each of up to three targets.

cards.name: Go-Shintai of Life's Origin
cards.text:
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}, {T}: Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Whenever Go-Shintai of Life's Origin or another nontoken Shrine enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 colorless Shrine enchantment creature token.

cards.name: Myojin of Towering Might
cards.text:
Myojin of Towering Might enters the battlefield with an indestructible counter on it if you cast it from your hand.
Remove an indestructible counter from Myojin of Towering Might: Distribute eight +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures you control. They gain trample until end of turn.

cards.name: Aerial Surveyor
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Aerial Surveyor attacks, if defending player controls more lands than you, search your library for a basic Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Crew 2

cards.text:
Flying
Untap all creatures you control during each other player's untap step.

cards.name: Ironsoul Enforcer
cards.text: Whenever Ironsoul Enforcer or a commander you control attacks alone, return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Myojin of Blooming Dawn enters the battlefield with an indestructible counter on it if you cast it from your hand.

Rampant Rejuvenator enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
When Rampant Rejuvenator dies, search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is Rampant Rejuvenator's power, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Put a +1/+1 counter on Kaima, the Fractured Calm for each creature goaded this way. (Until your next turn, the goaded creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)

cards.name: Kotori, Pilot Prodigy
cards.text:
Vehicles you control have crew 2.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, target artifact creature you control gains lifelink and vigilance until end of turn.

cards.name: Shorikai, Genesis Engine
cards.text:
{1}, {T}: Draw two cards, then discard a card. Create a 1/1 colorless Pilot creature token with "This creature crews Vehicles as though its power were 2 greater."
Crew 8 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 8 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
Shorikai, Genesis Engine can be your commander.

cards.name: Chishiro, the Shattered Blade
cards.text:
Whenever an Aura or Equipment enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/2 red Spirit creature token with menace.
At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on each modified creature you control. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

cards.name: Kotori, Pilot Prodigy
cards.text:
Vehicles you control have crew 2.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, target artifact creature you control gains lifelink and vigilance until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Some people test limits. I prefer to demolish them."

cards.name: Aeronaut Admiral
cards.text:
Flying
Vehicles you control have flying.
cards.flavor: The Consulate recruits its best pilots from the League of Aeronauts. Many go on to command entire fleets.

cards.name: Armed and Armored
cards.text: Vehicles you control become artifact creatures until end of turn. Choose a Dwarf you control. Attach any number of Equipment you control to it.
cards.flavor: The dwarves of Axgard seldom have reason to leave their impregnable underground kingdom-but when they do, they go in force.

cards.name: Cataclysmic Gearhulk
cards.text:
Vigilance
When Cataclysmic Gearhulk enters the battlefield, each player chooses an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a planeswalker from among the nonland permanents they control, then sacrifices the rest.

cards.name: Crush Contraband
cards.text:
Choose one or both -
• Exile target artifact.
• Exile target enchantment.
cards.flavor: The Izzet mage knew she would neither get her thermoinverter back nor have the satisfaction of exploding it herself.

cards.name: Dispatch
cards.text:
Tap target creature.
Metalcraft - If you control three or more artifacts, exile that creature.
cards.flavor: Venser wondered if it could still be called a teleportation spell if the destination is oblivion.

cards.name: Generous Gift
cards.text: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.
cards.flavor: The best presents are impossible to regift.

cards.name: Indomitable Archangel
cards.text:
Flying
Metalcraft - Artifacts you control have shroud as long as you control three or more artifacts. (An artifact with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
cards.flavor:
"Every sword drawn to defend is an angelic blade, guided to justice by an angelic hand."
-Auriok proverb

cards.name: Myrsmith
cards.text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token.
cards.flavor: The Auriok see the artificer as a conduit, beckoning new creations into the world.

cards.name: Parhelion II
cards.text:
Flying, first strike, vigilance
Whenever Parhelion II attacks, create two 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying and vigilance that are attacking.
Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

cards.name: Sram, Senior Edificer
cards.text: Whenever you cast an Aura, Equipment, or Vehicle spell, draw a card.
cards.flavor: "As this conflict grows, it gets harder to prevent the city from breaking down. How much longer can we keep this machinery balanced?"

cards.name: Swords to Plowshares
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
cards.flavor: "The arc of my blade has carved a path of light for the peace that will follow."

cards.name: Teshar, Ancestor's Apostle
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a historic spell, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
cards.flavor: "The Ancestor saved us for a purpose."

cards.name: Emry, Lurker of the Loch
cards.text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.
When Emry, Lurker of the Loch enters the battlefield, mill four cards.
{T}: Choose target artifact card in your graveyard. You may cast that card this turn. (You still pay its costs. Timing rules still apply.)

cards.name: Etherium Sculptor
cards.text: Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
cards.flavor: The greatest masters of the craft abandon tools altogether, shaping metal with hand and mind alone.

cards.name: Jace, Architect of Thought
cards.text:
[+1]: Until your next turn, whenever a creature an opponent controls attacks, it gets -1/-0 until end of turn.
[−2]: Reveal the top three cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library in any order.
[−8]: For each player, search that player's library for a nonland card and exile it, then that player shuffles. You may cast those cards without paying their mana costs.

cards.name: Master of Etherium
cards.text:
Master of Etherium's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control.
Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.
cards.flavor: "Only a mind unfettered with the concerns of the flesh can see the world as it truly is."

cards.name: Reality Shift
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller manifests the top card of their library. (That player puts the top card of their library onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. If it's a creature card, it can be turned face up any time for its mana cost.)

cards.name: Riddlesmith
cards.text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
cards.flavor: The Neurok see the artificer as an archaeologist, clearing away falsehoods to see the truth hidden beneath.

cards.name: Sai, Master Thopterist
cards.text:
Whenever you cast an artifact spell, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
{1}{U}, Sacrifice two artifacts: Draw a card.
cards.flavor: "Industry without artistry is just a fancy way to fill the junkyard."

cards.name: Thopter Spy Network
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control an artifact, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
Whenever one or more artifact creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.

cards.name: Thoughtcast
cards.text:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
Draw two cards.
cards.flavor: Vedalken eyes don't see the beauty in things. They see only what those things can teach.

cards.name: Vedalken Engineer
cards.text: {T}: Add two mana of any one color. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.
cards.flavor: Art is unknown to the vedalken-for them, all creations must serve a purpose.

cards.name: Whirler Rogue
cards.text:
When Whirler Rogue enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.
Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

cards.name: Agitator Ant
cards.text: At the beginning of your end step, each player may put two +1/+1 counters on a creature they control. Goad each creature that had counters put on it this way. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)

cards.name: Chain Reaction
cards.text: Chain Reaction deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
"We train for the improbable, like lightning striking the same place twice, or striking everywhere at once."
-Nundari, Sea Gate militia captain

cards.name: Chaos Warp
cards.text: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Elemental Mastery
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: Create X 1/1 red Elemental creature tokens with haste, where X is this creature's power. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step."

cards.name: Goblin Razerunners
cards.text:
{1}{R}, Sacrifice a land: Put a +1/+1 counter on Goblin Razerunners.
At the beginning of your end step, you may have Goblin Razerunners deal damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to target player or planeswalker.
cards.flavor: Finding themselves in a new and unexplored world, they immediately set it on fire.

cards.name: Krenko, Tin Street Kingpin
cards.text: Whenever Krenko, Tin Street Kingpin attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it, then create a number of 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens equal to Krenko's power.
cards.flavor: "After the people flee, but before the enemy arrives-that's grabbin' time."

cards.name: Ox of Agonas
cards.text:
When Ox of Agonas enters the battlefield, discard your hand, then draw three cards.
Escape-{R}{R}, Exile eight other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
Ox of Agonas escapes with a +1/+1 counter on it.

cards.name: Shifting Shadow
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has haste and "At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy this creature. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and attach Shifting Shadow to it, then put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in a random order."

cards.name: Starstorm
cards.text:
Starstorm deals X damage to each creature.
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: Ever since the disaster, the city's survivors viewed the star-strewn sky with dread.

cards.name: Taurean Mauler
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Taurean Mauler.
cards.flavor: The power of a waterfall. The fury of an avalanche. The intellect of a gale-force wind.

cards.name: Acidic Slime
cards.text:
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.
cards.flavor: It fears no sword and leaves no bones behind.

cards.name: Bear Umbra
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, untap all lands you control."
Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

cards.name: Beast Within
cards.text: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
cards.flavor: "Monsters dwell in every heart. We only think civilization tames them." ―Euphemia, Nexus watcher

cards.name: Champion of Lambholt
cards.text:
Creatures with power less than Champion of Lambholt's power can't block creatures you control.
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Champion of Lambholt.

cards.name: Fertilid
cards.text:
Fertilid enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Fertilid: Target player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles.

cards.name: Forgotten Ancient
cards.text:
Whenever a player casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Forgotten Ancient.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Forgotten Ancient onto other creatures.
cards.flavor: Its blood is life. Its body is growth.

cards.name: Genesis Hydra
cards.text:
When you cast this spell, reveal the top X cards of your library. You may put a nonland permanent card with mana value X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle the rest into your library.
Genesis Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

cards.name: Hunter's Insight
cards.text: Choose target creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker this turn, draw that many cards.
cards.flavor:
"The predator knows the true way of the world. Life is conflict. Only the strong survive."
-Garruk Wildspeaker

cards.name: Kodama's Reach
cards.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.
cards.flavor:
"The soul of Jukai reaches far beyond the forest's edge."
-Shigeki, Jukai visionary

cards.name: Loyal Guardian
cards.text:
Trample
Lieutenant - At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
cards.flavor: Each scar on its hide is a badge of honor.

cards.name: Nissa, Voice of Zendikar
cards.text:
[+1]: Create a 0/1 green Plant creature token.
[−2]: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
[−7]: You gain X life and draw X cards, where X is the number of lands you control.

cards.name: Ordeal of Nylea
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Nylea.
When you sacrifice Ordeal of Nylea, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.name: Primeval Protector
cards.text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature your opponents control.
When Primeval Protector enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.
cards.flavor: The earth shook in support of their cause, offering a champion of its own.

cards.name: Rampant Growth
cards.text: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
cards.flavor: Nature grows solutions to its problems.

cards.name: Rishkar, Peema Renegade
cards.text:
When Rishkar, Peema Renegade enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
Each creature you control with a counter on it has "{T}: Add {G}."
cards.flavor: "Aether is the soul of Kaladesh, and all souls should be free."

cards.name: Rishkar's Expertise
cards.text:
Draw cards equal to the greatest power among creatures you control.
You may cast a spell with mana value 5 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.
cards.flavor: "Control the Great Conduit? You might as well try to divert a river with your hands."

cards.name: Sakura-Tribe Elder
cards.text: Sacrifice Sakura-Tribe Elder: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
cards.flavor: He'd chosen a sunlit clearing with open skies and an ample brook. All that remained was to find a worthy sapling.

cards.name: Shamanic Revelation
cards.text:
Draw a card for each creature you control.
Ferocious - You gain 4 life for each creature you control with power 4 or greater.
cards.flavor: First, whispers of ancient days. Then, visions of things to come.

cards.name: Snake Umbra
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card."
Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

cards.name: Soul's Majesty
cards.text: Draw cards equal to the power of target creature you control.
cards.flavor: An avatar he sculpts of wisdom and strength.

cards.name: Spearbreaker Behemoth
cards.text:
Indestructible
{1}: Target creature with power 5 or greater gains indestructible until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Few Nayans dare hunt the gargantuans. They're regarded not as animals but as forces of nature, like landslides or typhoons.

cards.name: Vastwood Surge
cards.text:
Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)
Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. If this spell was kicked, put two +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.

cards.name: Whiptongue Hydra
cards.text:
Reach
When Whiptongue Hydra enters the battlefield, destroy all creatures with flying. Put a +1/+1 counter on Whiptongue Hydra for each creature destroyed this way.
cards.flavor:
"Where'd all the birds go?"
-Kaldrin, jungle sightseer

cards.name: Arcanist's Owl
cards.text:
Flying
When Arcanist's Owl enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact or enchantment card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.name: Dance of the Manse
cards.text: Return up to X target artifact and/or non-Aura enchantment cards each with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. If X is 6 or more, those permanents are 4/4 creatures in addition to their other types.

cards.name: Decimate
cards.text: Destroy target artifact, target creature, target enchantment, and target land.
cards.flavor: Anarchy comes in many forms: social, individual, Gruul . . .

cards.name: Grumgully, the Generous
cards.text: Each other non-Human creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
cards.flavor: "Does it matter what it is? Take it and be grateful!"

cards.name: Hanna, Ship's Navigator
cards.text: {1}{W}{U}, {T}: Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: "I never thought I'd spend my life fighting. I'm a maker, not a destroyer."

cards.name: Mage Slayer
cards.text:
Whenever equipped creature attacks, it deals damage equal to its power to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.
Equip {3}
cards.flavor:
"When the wielder is strong enough, any sword will do."
-Kresh the Bloodbraided

cards.name: Raff Capashen, Ship's Mage
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
You may cast historic spells as though they had flash. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

cards.name: Rhythm of the Wild
cards.text:
Creature spells you control can't be countered.
Nontoken creatures you control have riot. (They enter the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
cards.flavor: Some view Domri's unlikely ascent as a sign of Ilharg the Raze-Boar's imminent return.

cards.name: Ulasht, the Hate Seed
cards.text:
Ulasht, the Hate Seed enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other red creature you control and a +1/+1 counter on it for each other green creature you control.
{1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Ulasht: Choose one -
• Ulasht deals 1 damage to target creature.
• Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

cards.name: Arcane Signet
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
cards.flavor: It started as a mere drop of water. The Magic Mirror crystallized it into much more.

cards.name: Azorius Signet
cards.flavor: The maze-like design embodies the core of Azorius law-strict structure designed to test wills and stall change.

cards.name: Blackblade Reforged
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each land you control.
Equip legendary creature {3}
Equip {7}
cards.flavor: It spilled the blood of one elder dragon. In Gideon's hands, it may yet taste another's.

cards.name: Bonehoard
cards.text:
Living weapon (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 black Phyrexian Germ creature token, then attach this to it.)
Equipped creature gets +X/+X, where X is the number of creature cards in all graveyards.
Equip {2}

cards.name: Colossal Plow
cards.text:
Whenever Colossal Plow attacks, add {W}{W}{W} and you gain 3 life. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.
Crew 6 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 6 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

cards.name: Cultivator's Caravan
cards.text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

cards.name: Fellwar Stone
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.
cards.flavor:
"What do you have that I cannot obtain?"
-Mairsil, the Pretender

cards.name: Fireshrieker
cards.text:
Equipped creature has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Foundry Inspector
cards.text: Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
cards.flavor: Automaton inspectors ensure that the Consulate's stringent standards for mass production are upheld.

cards.name: Gold Myr
cards.text: {T}: Add {W}.
cards.flavor: The leonin thought of the myr as omens, never imagining the sinister fate they foretold.

cards.name: Mirage Mirror
cards.text: {2}: Mirage Mirror becomes a copy of target artifact, creature, enchantment, or land until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Most mirrors show your reflection. Others show your potential.

cards.name: Peacewalker Colossus
cards.text:
{1}{W}: Another target Vehicle you control becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.
Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
cards.flavor:
"Peace? Its sole purpose is fear."
-Saheeli Rai

cards.name: Raiders' Karve
cards.text:
Whenever Raiders' Karve attacks, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped.
Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

cards.name: Shimmer Myr
cards.text:
Flash
You may cast artifact spells as though they had flash.
cards.flavor: It evades Phyrexians by hiding in the spaces between seconds.

cards.name: Silver Myr
cards.text: {T}: Add {U}.
cards.flavor: The vedalken saw the myr as toys, unaware of the intelligence lurking behind their empty eyes.

cards.name: Skysovereign, Consul Flagship
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Skysovereign, Consul Flagship enters the battlefield or attacks, it deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls.
Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

cards.name: Smuggler's Copter
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Smuggler's Copter attacks or blocks, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

cards.name: Sol Ring
cards.text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.
cards.flavor: Lost to time is the artificer's art of trapping light from a distant star in a ring of purest gold.

cards.name: Solemn Simulacrum
cards.text:
When Solemn Simulacrum enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
When Solemn Simulacrum dies, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Swiftfoot Boots
cards.text:
Equipped creature has hexproof and haste.
Equip {1}
cards.flavor:
"There is great wisdom in rushing headlong into combat . . . if you're prepared."
-Kenjek, captain of the Thousand Swords

cards.name: Sword of Vengeance
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has first strike, vigilance, trample, and haste.
Equip {3}
cards.flavor: When wielded by a true believer, it matters little whether the sword is a relic or a replica.

cards.name: Weatherlight
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Weatherlight deals combat damage to a player, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a historic card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
Crew 3

cards.name: Cinder Glade
cards.text:
({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)
Cinder Glade enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.
cards.flavor: On the volcanic continent of Akoum, bizarre vegetation clusters around gas vents, and jagged mountain peaks rise high into the air.

cards.name: Command Tower
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
cards.flavor: When defeat is near and guidance is scarce, all eyes look in one direction.

cards.name: Exotic Orchard
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.
cards.flavor:
"It was a strange morning. When we awoke, we found our trees transformed. We didn't know whether to water them or polish them."
-Pulan, Bant orchardist

cards.name: Game Trail
cards.text:
As Game Trail enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Mountain or Forest card from your hand. If you don't, Game Trail enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

cards.name: Gruul Turf
cards.text:
Gruul Turf enters the battlefield tapped.
When Gruul Turf enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {R}{G}.

cards.name: Mossfire Valley
cards.flavor: The battle at Ganzan Pass left the land so saturated with blood and twisted kami magic that it was a century before a single blade of grass could take root.

cards.name: Opal Palace
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. If you spend this mana to cast your commander, it enters the battlefield with a number of additional +1/+1 counters on it equal to the number of times it's been cast from the command zone this game.

cards.name: Oran-Rief, the Vastwood
cards.text:
Oran-Rief, the Vastwood enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.
{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each green creature that entered the battlefield this turn.

cards.name: Port Town
cards.text:
As Port Town enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Plains or Island card from your hand. If you don't, Port Town enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
cards.flavor: A haunted fog known as the Nebelgast shrouds the cities along Nephalia's coast.

cards.name: Prairie Stream
cards.text:
({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)
Prairie Stream enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.
cards.flavor: The continent of Ondu is a vast plateau crisscrossed by deep trenches and meandering rivers.

cards.name: Raging Ravine
cards.text:
Raging Ravine enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
{2}{R}{G}: Until end of turn, Raging Ravine becomes a 3/3 red and green Elemental creature with "Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it." It's still a land.

cards.name: Skycloud Expanse
cards.flavor: Remote but always watching, the soaring city of Otawara moves over Kamigawa with a purpose that few understand.

cards.name: Spire of Industry
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color. Activate only if you control an artifact.
cards.flavor: A beacon of prosperity to some, a shadow of oppression to others.

cards.name: Temple of Abandon
cards.text:
Temple of Abandon enters the battlefield tapped.
When Temple of Abandon enters the battlefield, scry 1.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

cards.name: Temple of Enlightenment
cards.text:
Temple of Enlightenment enters the battlefield tapped.
When Temple of Enlightenment enters the battlefield, scry 1.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
